reviewText: Well Done!!!
Great movies
Three of my favorite movies
liked all 3 movies and was glad they were offered all together
very good

Love the series, am watching it for the 2nd time, really inspired me and now I believe there are 2nd chances for love and in relationship with love ones..I hope they make Note 4, 5, 6 , 7, 8....I really recommend it
AMAZING shows!  Great value and sure to touch your heart...
now i have all three movies in one box set . i am very happy.
The video and sound quality is very good
Warm stories to watch.
I've had The Note for years, but didn't even know there was a Note 3.  Now I have all three of them...love it!

The Note Collection all in one are on two discs. The 1st and 2nd are on disc one and the 3rd is on the second dvd. It also has bonus features and deleted scenes. I usually purchase the digital so I can have easy access to the collection. But in this case I bought the bundle for less than what the three would have cost me on each purchase. I loved all three. It's a tearjerker series! It hits the heart and if you like romance with a little mystery than this set is for you!

I've only watched the first movie which was excellent but I needed to make a correction on the packaging for your information. It appears the first 2 movies are on one DVD and the Note 3 is on the other one. I thought I was missing a movie when I first opened the package. Hope that helps!
The Note is the best, but all are very good well made movies.
Got the set for my wife and I actually enjoyed them as well

I have only watched the first movie "The Note", but I totally loved it.... It is beautifully written and acted.  The story is great with a surprise ending.  If you like movies with no swearing and high morals, you will love this movie. My only caution is that you better take your tissue box when you watch it because I cried a ton as I watched... Going to watch it again and again. Very uplifting

This is such a great DVD set! I was going to purchase the first movie and was very pleased to find this set all together for a great price! It's heart-warming and hopeful! You will not be disappointed!
Arrived in great condition.
Really liked these movies.
I loved all three of these movies.  Hooked on them I guess as I have watched each one 3 times.
The Note and Note II worked very well but Note III kept stopping even after I cleaned it.  I never did get to see Note III.
Love these 3 movies.  Great romance stories.
I've seen these movies before but I enjoy watching them again.  Perfect the 3 were sold together.

Gave this one as a gift. The recipients had been looking for the 3rd part of this trilogy for a while so it was nice to find the whole set on one DVD. They loved the movie and reported that it brought tears but ended happily.
Great family movie

I saw The Note on television and the story was so good I wanted to own it. THE sequels are good as well, but my favorite is the original. I received the order very quickly and an really satisfied with my purchase.
Well, Notes are romantic movies for my wife. However, I enjoyed Note but let my wife see the rest alone.
Waited for this set of "The Note"  and was not disappointed by the final episode.

This three movie set arrived as promised.  So pleased to have all three in one package!  Each movie has message for everyone watching.  Have enjoyed the story lines in each...  Wish they made more of these kind of movies.
I liked the Note movies.  They were nice feel good movies.
VERY misleading ... I thought I was getting The Note, The Note II, AND The Note 3 -- THREE discs, not TWO. Why would I want 2 & 3 when I haven't seen the FIRST one on the series? Really? :(
Happy with delivery and the product itself. Satisfied

Delivered on Time.
Was what I was told and wanted.  Great !!!!
Packging was very good.
Loved the movies
Love these movies.  Really enjoy Genie Francis and the male lead (whom I usually don't enjoy).
Thanks.
Great movies fast shipping
Awesome movies! Wholesome and fun!
Nice movies
The whole family loved this trilogy- great in every aspect.
Good movies!!
Great price for this wonderful series!
I liked having all three movies in one set.  The movies are interesting and worthwhile to view. They all arrived in good condition.
